answers.answer: I feel you hun! I had a serious UTI at 28 weeks...downhill from there. I have SPD, and serious iron deficiency, vitamin D deficiency, now they're closely watching me for gestational diabetes!!! I went into preterm labour last Wednesday at 33 weeks...but it stopped and I had no dilation of the cervix. I feel like this 3rd one should never have happened.just letting you know I understand how you feel and you aren't alone.

I have already had a down syndrome scare, luckily it came back negative after the panorama test. My sugar was up once and then she sent me in for a 3 hour gtt and it came back negative. But yeah I'm thinking I'm getting to old to be pregnant with this 3rd baby. I am 30 years old 30 weeks pregnant with my 3rd girl! I'm going crazy!!!

question: I have had so many things going on with this pregnancy. I have had a kidney infection this whole time, and now I'm fighting with protein in my urine, and high blood pressure. I am 30.2 weeks and my midwife is afraid of preterm labor.  Ahhh scary stuff. I'm trying to keep calm but it's hard!
title: Rough pregnancy!
